Sentence: Tyrion Lannister, a little person who is brother to Cersei and Jaime, travels with Jon to the Wall to see the massive structure
Tyrion visits him (Ned) on his (Ned) way south from the Wall to deliver a greeting from Jon
Tyrion continues south as Catelyn starts back north, and when their paths cross Catelyn has him (Jon) seized for trying to kill Bran
Lysa accuses Tyrion of arranging the murder of both Jon Arryn and Bran
